summary: A cannon, bombs, dynamite - all what you need to fight your enemies
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=============================
Strotis Cannon Resource for Skyrim

Version 1.0
=============================

by Stroti

Converted by Tamira

=============================

Modders resource
=============================

This is a conversion of Stroti's Cannon Resource, originally published for Oblivion. You can find the original resource files here:
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/35800

A cannon, bombs, dynamite - all what you need to fight your enemies.

All meshes are static and not animated. In addition I added the single dynamite and the bomb as clutter object.

A demo esp is included for a quick overview. I placed the objects on top of the Western Watchtower near Whiterun. Don't let this esp activated when you seriously play your game.


=================
Tools used:
=================

Blender
Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
Creation Kit

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites.

Stroti has quit modding and will no longer be active on the forums.
I have his personal permission to convert his Oblivion resources and to upload them.

=================
Credits:
=================

Stroti for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community!
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
Bethesda for the TES games.
author: Stroti and Tamira
